Sentence: Beaver, Peter, Susan, and Lucy plot to meet Aslan at the Stone Table the following day, but they soon notice that Edmund has disappeared
Aslan sends Peter to help her (Susan)
Aslan, Susan, and Lucy charge join the battle between Peter's army and the Witch's troops
Peter and his (Aslan) troops are exhausted
Fortunately, Aslan swiftly kills the Witch and Peter's army then defeats the Witch's followers
